Module FloWeekTracker
Package com.floweektracker.model

Class SingleTask

java.lang.Object
com.floweektracker.model.SingleTask
public class SingleTask extends Object
Represents the SingleTask object in the application. Contains field with information about the task and access methods for it.

Fields: taskName, description, time, isDone, weekday, priority

Methods: calculatePoints(), copy(), setPriority(byte), areEventTimeAndPriorityCorrect(LocalTime, WeekDays, byte)

  • Constructor Details

    • SingleTask

      public SingleTask(String taskName, String description, LocalTime time, boolean isDone, WeekDays weekday, byte priority)
      Public constructor for the SingleTask object. Checks if the time, weekday and priority are correct. If not, throws and IllegalArgumentException.
      Parameters:
      taskName - a name of the task
      description - a description of the task
      time - a time of the task
      isDone - a flag if the task is done
      weekday - a day of the week
      priority - a priority of the task
      See Also:
      • areEventTimeAndPriorityCorrect(LocalTime, WeekDays, byte)
      • TaskAddingDialog
      • TaskEditingDialog
      • TasksService

    • setPriority

      public void setPriority(byte priority)
      Set given priority to the priority field. Throws an IllegalArgumentException if the priority is out of range.
      Parameters:
      priority - a priority of the task
